Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Grants retroactive tier II membership in the New York state and local police and fire retirement system to Daniel Rizzo
Summary: Grants retroactive tier II membership in the New York state and local police and fire retirement system to Daniel Rizzo.
ActClause: AN ACT granting retroactive tier II membership in the New York state and local police and fire retirement system to Daniel Rizzo
